name: @mono-labs/cli
description: A CLI tool for building and deploying projects

scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm publish --access public --registry https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "chore: release %s" && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "chore: release %s" && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "chore: release %s" && npm publish --access public

author: Your Name
